code: @Override public void createRestoredJob(StreamExecutionEnvironment env) {     /**      * Original job: Source -> StatefulMap1 -> CHAIN(StatefulMap2 -> Map -> StatefulMap3)      * Modified job: Source -> StatefulMap1 -> CHAIN(StatefulMap3 -> Map -> StatefulMap2)      */     DataStream<Integer> source = createSource(env, ExecutionMode.RESTORE).     SingleOutputStreamOperator<Integer> first = createFirstStatefulMap(ExecutionMode.RESTORE, source).     first.startNewChain().     SingleOutputStreamOperator<Integer> third = createThirdStatefulMap(ExecutionMode.RESTORE, first).     third.startNewChain().     SingleOutputStreamOperator<Integer> stateless = createStatelessMap(third).     SingleOutputStreamOperator<Integer> second = createSecondStatefulMap(ExecutionMode.RESTORE, stateless). }
